short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Modifies the attributes on the FMINSIDE webpage to display stats in the 1-20 range

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your FMINSIDE experience with the FMINSIDE Stats Modifier extension! Designed to enhance your gameplay analysis, this tool modifies player attribute stats on the FMINSIDE website, converting them into a simplified 1-20 scale.
